section.text: *NOTE: This section was repealed by emergency legislation that will expire on October 25, 2023. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation affecting this section, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Delegation of functions.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-269: § 601 of D.C. Law 23-269 provided that the creation of this section by § 501(b) of D.C. Law 23-269 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7276 of D.C. Law 24-45 repealed the applicability provision of section 601 of D.C. Law 23-269 that impacted this section. Therefore the amendment of this section by Law 23-269 has been implemented.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Floodplain Review Authority Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-188, July 27, 2023, 70 DCR 10716).
